Does It Really Work?

Everything works fine until you get to the Product License Activation Options...
I select that I have the activation code, plug the request into X-Force (32 bits, after having done the mem patch). 

It supplies me with a code, yes, but the code is 8 characters short. What am I supposed to do for the missing 8 spaces? Two whole boxes are not being filled out.

Is there another way to get the activation code??

Everything works fine until you get to the Product License Activation Options...

When I run x-force (I'd followed all the instructions, including the Mem Patch) and paste the Request Code into it, it does indeed supply me with an activation code, but that code is 8 characters too short. Two boxes aren't even filled, and obviously Maya doesn't let you continue when you don't have a full activation code. 

Is there another place to get an activation code?
Ack, sorry for the double post. It showed up once and when I directed myself back to this page it disappeared. Once I posted it showed up again, haha.

Aha! Apparently you don't need the last two boxes filled. It accepted the activation code on the third try, with the last two boxes still not filled out.

I've yet to download this specific torrent (About to, since my won't work... but here's the fix for the blank screen with radio buttons:

go to this directory:
C:\Program Files\Common Files\Autodesk Shared\AdLM\R1\en-US\Webdepot

Find the file RTBeginReg.html, open it in notepad, and add the following line directly below  :



That should fix the radio button problem. Another thing to try if that doesn't work (Which it should) is to enter command prompt and type two lines:

regsrv32 jscript.dll
regsrv32 vbscript.dll

apparently I can't type html code in the comment boxes... The fix mentioned above goes under the html (located inside < >) and the line is
!-- saved from url=(0016)http://localhost --

(also inside < >'s)

I had a problem with override licence..so the instalation is fine, but if you have a problem like this:

License was not obtained

Tried Maya 2011 (657C1 2011.0.0.F), error 20



License method:

environment variable MAYA_LICENSE_METHOD='standalone'



Product choice:

environment variable MAYA_LICENSE='unlimited'



License file override:

environment variable MAYA_ALT_EN is not set


Then i did was this:

- I uninstalled everything i installed (every previous version of Maya)
- I deleted registry input in regedit for Autodesk
(used a program called RegSeeker)
- I deleted FLEXLM and FLEXnet
- Installed again Autodesk Maya 2011 previous downloaded from this torrent.

I hope i helped someone! :))
